parameter.name: title
parameter.description: A string representing the request title.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: The description of the pull request.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: Source object containing the branch and the repository data.

parameter.name: destination
parameter.description: Destination object containing the branch and the commit data.

parameter.name: reviewers
parameter.description: A list of user objects to add as reviewers.

parameter.name: closeSourceBranch
parameter.description: Boolean indicating whether Bitbucket should close the source branch after the pull requests gets merged successfully.
